channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Server

item.title: CVE-2017-11876|2024-09-17T00:26:38.656Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20server
item.description: Microsoft Project Server and Microsoft SharePoint Enterprise Server 2016 allow an attacker to use cross-site forgery to read content that they are not authorized to read, use the victim's identity to take actions on the web application on behalf of the victim, such as change permissions and delete content, and inject malicious content in the browser of the victim, aka "Microsoft Project Server Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability".
